Name: DROPSHIP
About the game: DROPSHIP is a challenging new twist on a classic formula. A skill based game that will test your patience and determination, DROPSHIP was designed to be hard as nails and unforgiving. Can you keep your cool and make it to the end? GAMEPLAY Navigate through dangerous environments Conserve fuel and bend gravity to your will Drop to the landing pad Don't blow up your ship in the process Repeat FEATURES 40 increasingly tense levels Leaderboards to test your times against other pilots Practice mode for new recruits Hardcore mode; limited lives and high scores. How far can you get? Potentially rage inducing, skill based gameplay A vibrant and eye catching visual style
Meta Title: DROPSHIP: Nov 30, 2022, Mini Goliath and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on DROPSHIP? Check out the release date (Nov 30, 2022), developer insights from Mini Goliath, and a complete game summary.
